Package parser.nodes.conditions

Class IfNode

java.lang.Object
parser.nodes.conditions.IfNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Exec, Validator
public class IfNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements Exec
This class is used to run if statements. It contains a condition and a block of statements to run if the condition is true. It also contains an else node which may be run if the condition is false. Note that the else node is not required and may therefore be null.

    • execute

      public java.lang.Object execute​(boolean DEBUG)
      Check the condition, if it is true run the statements in the else block. If the condition is false and the elseNode != null run the statements in the else block.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
